ḍa catuṣkam

saihikeya grahe ca api devatāḍaḥ hutāśane

apogaṇḍaḥ tu śiśuke vikala aṅga iti bhīruke
iti ḍa anta vargaḥ
ḍha dvikam

original: dṛḍhaḥ sthūle bhṛśe śakte pragāḍhe'pi dṛḍho mataḥ ||

original: druṇaṁ cāpe ca khaḍge ca druṇo vṛścikabhṛṅgayoḥ || 6 ||

uddaśe nārikele ca

nistraṇa syāt upāye nistāre nirgame api ca

taṇḍurīṇaḥ kīṭa mātre varvare taṇḍula udake  /

pravāraṇa niṣedhe syāt kāmya dāne pravāraṇam  /
juhurāṇa unala idhvaryau rerihāṇaḥ hara imbare
devamaṇiḥ śiveśvasya kaṇṭha āvartte ca kaustubhe  /
cūḍāmaṇiḥ śiraḥ ratne kāka ciñcā phale pi ca
para vāṇiḥ smṛtaḥ dharmma adhyakṣa vatsarayoḥ api
śara vāṇiḥ śara mukhe ṣāṇḍakaye śara jīvini
lambakarṇaḥ smṛtaḥ kolapādape chagale pi ca
hastikarṇa uruvūke syāt palāśa gaṇabhedayoḥ
cīrṇaparṇaḥ tu nimbe syāt kharjjūrī bhūruhe api ca
tailaparṇī malayaje śrīvāse sihlake api ca
pīluparṇī tu bimbāyāḥ mūrvāyām oṣadhībhidi
dākṣāyaṇī tu aparṇāyāḥ rohiṇyā tārakāsu ca
puṣkariṇī sarojinyāḥ hastinyāḥ ca jalāśaye
śikhariṇī syāt romālyāḥ rasālā vṛtta bhedayoḥ
strīratne mallikāyām ca proktā śikhariṇī budhaiḥ
aṅgāriṇī hasantyām ca bhāskara tyakta diśi api
bhavet vaitaraṇī nadyā yātumātari
ṇa pañcakam
avagrahaṇam iti āhuḥ pratirodhe pi anādare
pravidāraṇam ākhyāta saṅgare ca vidāraṇe
bhūta ādi grahe vastra añcala īrccane  /
romaharṣaṇam iti etat romāñce pi vibhītake
paribhāṣaṇam ālāpe niyame paribhāṣaṇam
nindā upālambha vacane paribhāṣaṇam iṣyate
matta vāraṇam icchānti dāna klinna kaṭa dvipe
mahā prāsāda vīthīnām varaṇḍe ca api apāśraye
vātarāyaṇam unmatte niṣprayojana pūruṣe

analyzed: lohita kaṅkume rakte gośīrṣe ca kucandane

idānī vākyabhūṣāyā samprati arthe ca varttate

original: kathaṁ praśne sambhrame ca prakārārthe ca sambhave || 52 ||
analyzed: praśne sambhrame ca prakāra arthe ca sambhave

original: kimu sambhāvanāyāṁ syādvimarṣe ca kimu smṛtam ||
analyzed: kimu sambhāvanāyā syāt vimarṣe ca kimu smṛtam
bhṛśa prakarṣe ca atyartha ivaśya nitya prayatnayoḥ
yāntāḥ
ayi praśna anunayayoḥ samaya antika madhyayoḥ

original: aye krodhe viṣāde ca sambhrame smaraṇe'pi ca || 54 ||
analyzed: krodhe viṣāde ca sambhrame smaraṇe api ca
ra antāḥ

original: pra prakarṣe gatādyarthe duḥ syāt kaṣṭaniṣedhayoḥ ||
analyzed: pra prakarṣe gata ādi arthe dus syāt kaṣṭa niṣedhayoḥ
punar aprathame bhede svar svarga para lokayoḥ   /
parā vimokṣa prādhānya pratilomeṣu varttate

original: ābhimukhye bhṛṣārthe ca vikrame ca gatau vadhe || 56 ||
analyzed: ābhimukhye bhṛṣā arthe ca vikrame ca gatau vadhe  /
purā purāṇe nikaṭa prabandha atīta bhāviṣu
pari syāt sarvatobhāve varjane lakṣaṇā ādiṣu
pūjā āliṅgana vīpsāsu bhūṣaṇe vyādhi śokayoḥ
doṣa ākhyāne api uparame vyāptau nivasane api ca

original: prāduḥ prākāśyavṛttau syāt sambhāvye ca prayujyate ||
analyzed: prādur prākāśya vṛttau syāt sambhāvye ca prayujyate
niḥ niścaye krānta ādi arthe niḥ niḥśeṣa niṣedhayoḥ
antar madhye tathā prānte svīkāra arthe api dṛśyate
urarī corarī corī vistāra iṅgīkṛtau trayam
antarā api vinā arthe syāt madhyārtha nikaṭa arthayoḥ
la antāḥ
kila śabdaḥ tu vārttāyā sambhāvya anunaya arthayoḥ
khalu syāt vākya bhūṣāyāḥ jijñāsā ādau ca sāntvane

original: niṣedhane'pi vīpsāyāṁ khalu māne ca kīrttitam || 62 ||
analyzed: niṣedhane api vīpsāyāḥ khalu māne ca kīrttitam
vāntāḥ
avālambana vijñāna viyoga vyāpti śuddhiṣu
īṣat arthe paribhave ipi eva aupamya iva dhāraṇe
ṣa antāḥ
uṣāḥ rātrau tad ante syāt atra anavyayam api uṣāḥ
doṣāḥ rātri mukhe rātrau atra anavyayam api asau
nikaṣā tu antike madhye rakṣaḥ mātari anavyayam
sa pūjāyāḥ bhṛṣā artha anumati kṛcchra samṛddhiṣu
puratas prathame ca agre api agratas prathama agrayoḥ
purā ugre prathame ca syāt añjasā tattva tūrṇayoḥ
amitaḥ śīghra sākalya sammukha ubhayatas ntike

original: bhūyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ khyātaṁ prabhūtārthe tvanavyayam || 67 ||
analyzed: bhūyas punar punar khyāta prabhūta arthe tu anavyayam
niḥ niścaye niṣedhe ca sākalya atītayoḥ api
tiras ntarddhau tiryak arthe mithas nyonya mithas rahaḥ
pūrvedyus iṣyate prātar pūrvedyus pūrva vāsare
śanais śanaiścare svaire nīcaiḥ svaira alpayoḥ matam
ha antāḥ
ha syāt sambodhane śive

original: hā viṣāde ca śoke ca duḥkhārthe'pi ca kathyate || 70 ||
analyzed: hā viṣāde ca śoke ca duḥkha arthe api ca kathyate
hi pāda pūraṇe hetau viśeṣe pi avadhāraṇe
duḥkha hetau uddiṣṭaḥ vismaya viṣādayoḥ

original: hāhā duḥkhe huhū harṣe gandharve'mū tvanavyaye ||
analyzed: hāhā duḥkhe huhū harṣe gandharva emū tu anavyaye

original: he hai vyastau samastau ca hūtisambodhanārthayoḥ || 72 ||
analyzed: he hai vyastau samastau ca hūti sambodhana arthayoḥ
ho hau ca evavidhau jñeyau sambuddha āhlānayoḥ api
saha sākalya sādṛśya yaugapadya samṛddhiṣu
vidyamāne ca sambandhe saha śabdaḥ prakīrttitaḥ
aho dhik arthe śoke ca karuṇā artha viṣādayoḥ
āho uta aho dvau etau paripraśna vicārayoḥ
aha śabdaḥ niyoga arthe kṣepa arthe api nigadyate

original: kṣāntāḥ maṅkṣu śīghre bhṛṣārthe ca tattvārthe'pi kkacinmatam || 75 ||
analyzed: kṣāntāḥ śīghre bhṛ ṣa arthe ca tattva arthe pi kkacid matam
iti avyayām eka artha vargaḥ
yadi apūrva tayā kiñcid nāma atra pratibhāti ca
tat tat anviṣyatā sadbhiḥ nāma pārāyaṇa ādiṣu
tad tad kavi indraiḥ atha paṇḍita indraiḥ prayoga sambodha phala dvaya āptyai
yaiḥ nāma kaṇṭha ābharaṇa taiḥ sarvajña tā sva praṇayīkṛtā eva
svaira pracāraiḥ parikalpitābhiḥ śabda artha sambodha kathā prathābhiḥ
vyākhyābhiḥ aprāpta mudā pramoda mā ādhātum atra eṣa pariśramaḥ naḥ  /

original: etāṁ kṛtiṁ kṛtadhiyaḥ kṛtakṛtyabhāva - māpādayantu sadayaṁ,
analyzed: etā kṛti kṛta dhiyaḥ kṛtakṛtya bhāva mā āpādayantu sadaya
sadaya tu cetaḥ

original: nityaṁ maheśvarakaveḥ paribhāvayantaḥ santaḥ paronnatiratā hi bhavanti loke || 4 ||
analyzed: maheśvara kaveḥ paribhāvayantaḥ santaḥ para unnati ratāḥ hi bhavanti loke
rāma anala vyoma rūpaiḥ śaka kāla abhilakṣite

original: iti śrīsakalavaidyarājacakramuktāśekharasya gadyapadyavidyānidheḥ śrīmaheśvarasya kṛtau viśvaprakāśe anekārthāvyayaparicchedo dvitīyaḥ ||
analyzed: iti śrī sakala vaidya rāja cakra muktā śekharasya gadya padya vidyā nidheḥ śrī maheśvarasya kṛtau viśvaprakāśe aneka artha avyaya paricchedaḥ dvitīyaḥ
samāptaḥ yaḥ viśva prakāśaḥ
śubham astu
